body_text: What's the name of the song that played in the last few minutes of episode 13, Charlotte? It's towards the end of the episode, something about Sinking Ships but I can't find the song.

What is the name of the ZHIEND song in the middle of episode 13? In episode 13 of Charlotte, there is a ZHIEND song playing about halfway in the episode, just before Yu in insane mode starts stealing other people's abilities, such as the bomb ability.
